intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What is your favorite movie genre?
What is your favorite thing about summer?
What is your favorite restaurant food?

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to play outside?
respond_situations.description: You are talking to a friend.

respond_situations.starter_line: Happy birthday! Are you having a party?
respond_situations.description: You meet your friend on their birthday.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You can choose a drink.
You are in a clothing shop. You see a shirt.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You are in a shop. Ask the seller for the price of a toy.
You want to ask your parent for a pet. ..

listening_script.text: We have dinner at home. My family is very happy. We eat rice and chicken. We talk and laugh together. Dinner is fun for us.

follow_up_questions.question: When do you eat this fruit?
Where do you buy this fruit?
Why do you like this fruit?
